verses.name: Ezekiel 28:8
verses.text: They shall bring thee down to the pit, and thou shalt die the deaths of them that are slain in the midst of the seas.

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:9
verses.text: Wilt thou yet say before him that slayeth thee, I am God? but thou shalt be a man, and no God, in the hand of him that slayeth thee.

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:10
verses.text: Thou shalt die the deaths of the uncircumcised by the hand of strangers: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:11
verses.text: Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
